trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何在集合中的列上设置属性，它们时自动生成和事件发生时。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the standard width and sizing mode of columns and headers in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中列和标题的标准宽度和大小调整模式。

trans-unit.source: The width and sizing mode of the columns and headers, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 列和标题的宽度和大小调整模式（在 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 中）。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.SizeToHeader" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.SizeToHeader" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A> property set on an individual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> takes precedence over the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Width%2A>在单个上设置属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>优先于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth%2A> property is constrained by the following properties if they are set, in order of precedence:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridLength.DisplayValue%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth%2A>如果被设置会按优先顺序，以下属性受约束的属性：

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnWidth" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 为当前处于编辑模式的单元格或行调用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> 命令。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> command for the cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 为当前处于编辑模式的单元格或行调用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> 命令。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell or row exits edit mode, or if no cells or rows are in edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的单元格或行已经处于编辑模式或没有单元格或行处于编辑模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is currently being edited, this method commits any pending changes to the cell without committing any pending changes to the row.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在编辑的单元格，此方法提交任意挂起的更改到单元格且不将任何挂起的更改提交到的行。

trans-unit.source: This means that changes are propagated from the cell editing control to the pending row.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着更改从单元格内编辑控件添加到该挂起行传播。

trans-unit.source: If a cell is not currently being edited, all pending row edits are committed.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前正在编辑单元格，所有挂起的行编辑不会提交。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies whether to commit row or cell edits.
trans-unit.target: 用于指定是否提交行或单元格编辑的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> to exit edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> 表示退出编辑模式；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Invokes the <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> command for the specified cell or row currently in edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 为当前处于编辑模式的指定单元格或行调用 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CommitEditCommand" /> 命令。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current cell or row exits edit mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前单元格或行退出编辑模式，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method commits any pending changes for the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit> and exits edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 此方法提交任何挂起的更改指定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridEditingUnit>并退出编辑模式。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to commit pending changes to the current cell or row and exit edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令，该命令指示提交对当前单元格或行所做的挂起更改并退出编辑模式的意图。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the default row content is prepared.
trans-unit.target: 在默认行内容准备好之后发生。

trans-unit.source: Event listeners can modify or add to the row clipboard content.
trans-unit.target: 事件侦听器可以修改或添加到行剪贴板内容。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置具有焦点的单元格。

trans-unit.source: Information about the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 有关具有焦点的单元格的信息。

trans-unit.source: The value returned is a structure that provides information about the cell and the data item associated with the cell.
trans-unit.target: 返回的值是一个结构，它提供有关该单元格和与该单元格关联的数据项信息。

trans-unit.source: It is not an actual reference to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell> container.
trans-unit.target: 它不是对实际引用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell>容器。

trans-unit.source: To set properties on the selected cells, you can set a trigger in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要在选定的单元格上设置属性，可以设置触发器<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CellStyle%2A>。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when the value of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> property has changed.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> 属性的值更改后发生。

trans-unit.source: The value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property can change as a result of mouse or keyboard gestures, or because of a change to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn%2A> property value.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性可以更改是鼠标或键盘手势，或由于变化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn%2A>属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the column that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含当前单元格的列。

trans-unit.source: The column that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 包含当前单元格的列。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: A value of `null` indicates that an individual cell does not have focus.
trans-unit.target: 值为`null`指示各个单元格不具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: For example, a row has focus.
trans-unit.target: 例如，行具有焦点。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentColumn" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the data item bound to the row that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取与包含当前单元格的行绑定的数据项。

trans-unit.source: The data item bound to the row that contains the current cell.
trans-unit.target: 与包含当前单元格的行绑定的数据项。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property gets the data item for the row that either has focus, or contains the cell that has focus.
trans-unit.target: 此属性获取具有焦点时，或包含具有焦点的单元格的行的数据项目。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> value returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 它相当于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCellInfo.Item%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>返回值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentCell%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentItem" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CurrentItem" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Represents the command that indicates the intention to delete the current row.
trans-unit.target: 表示命令，该命令指示删除当前行的意图。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Delete" /> command that indicates the intention to delete the current row.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="P:System.Windows.Input.ApplicationCommands.Delete" /> 命令，用于指示删除当前行的意图。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the drag indicator that is displayed while dragging a column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在呈现拖动列标题时显示的拖动指示器时使用的样式。

trans-unit.source: The style applied to a column header when dragging.
trans-unit.target: 在拖动时应用于列标题的样式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drag indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义<xref:System.Windows.Style>对于拖动指示器中，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control>。

trans-unit.source: You can set properties in the style to change the appearance of certain elements of the drag indicator, such as the border around the column header.
trans-unit.target: 可以在要更改的外观的某些元素的拖动指示器，如列标题的边框的样式来设置属性。

trans-unit.source: However, the default template for the drag indicator uses a <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush> to paint a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas> with an image of the original column header that is being dragged.
trans-unit.target: 但是，拖动指示器的默认模板使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>来绘制<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>原始列标题所拖动的映像。

trans-unit.source: As a result, if you set some properties in your style, such as <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>, they will appear to not be applied.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果你设置某些属性在样式中，如<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Background%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Control.Foreground%2A>，它们将显示不会应用。

trans-unit.source: To change the appearance of the column header while it is being dragged, apply a new template that does not use the default <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>.
trans-unit.target: 若要更改列标题的外观进行拖动时，应用新模板不使用默认值<xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualBrush>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DragIndicatorStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the style that is applied to indicate the drop location when dragging a column header.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置在拖动列标题时应用以指示放置位置的样式。

trans-unit.source: The style applied to a column header.
trans-unit.target: 应用于列标题的样式。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: To define a <xref:System.Windows.Style> for the drop location indicator, specify a <xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A> of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>.
trans-unit.target: 若要定义<xref:System.Windows.Style>放置位置标志，指定<xref:System.Windows.Style.TargetType%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Separator>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DropLocationIndicatorStyle" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.DropLocationIndicatorStyle" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether column virtualization is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用列虚拟化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if column virtualization is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用列虚拟化，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableColumnVirtualization" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableColumnVirtualization" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether row virtualization is enabled.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用行虚拟化。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if row virtualization is enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果启用行虚拟化，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> does not instantiate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item in the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>不会实例化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>绑定的数据源中的每个数据项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>对象仅当它们需要并为它可以重用它们。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>为每个数据项的当前视图中，当它滚动出视野时回收行的对象。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the key that references the default border brush for a focused cell.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于引用带焦点单元格的默认边框画笔的键。

trans-unit.source: The key that references the default brush for a focused cell.
trans-unit.target: 用于引用带焦点单元格的默认画笔的键。

trans-unit.source: The default style for <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> references this brush to create a thicker border around a focused cell.
trans-unit.target: 默认样式<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>引用此创建粗的已设定焦点的单元格边框的画笔。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of non-scrolling columns.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置非滚动列的数目。

trans-unit.source: The number of non-scrolling columns.
trans-unit.target: 无法滚动的列数。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值为 0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Frozen columns are columns that are always displayed and cannot be scrolled out of visibility.
trans-unit.target: 冻结的列是始终显示，并且不能滚动到可见性的列。

trans-unit.source: Frozen columns are always the leftmost columns in display order.
trans-unit.target: 冻结的列始终是显示顺序中的最左侧列。

trans-unit.source: You cannot drag frozen columns into the group of unfrozen columns or drag unfrozen columns into the group of frozen columns.
trans-unit.target: 无法将冻结的列拖到的未冻结的列组，或将未冻结的列拖到的冻结列组。

trans-unit.source: To freeze columns, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要冻结的列，设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: The leftmost columns specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> number will become frozen.
trans-unit.target: 指定的最左侧列<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>数将变为冻结状态。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A> to 2, the two left columns in the display are frozen.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果你设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount%2A>为 2，在显示的两个左的列均已冻结。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether a column is already frozen, check the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsFrozen%2A> property on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否已冻结的列，请检查<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsFrozen%2A>属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to make a column frozen when "Freeze Column" is selected from the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何将从选择"冻结的列"时冻结列设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContextMenu>。

trans-unit.source: Columns are moved to the left in order to be included in the frozen columns.
trans-unit.target: 若要包括在冻结的列，向左移动列。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.FrozenColumnCount" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The properties of the object to be in the columns.
trans-unit.target: 要位于列中的对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: Generates columns for the specified properties of an object.
trans-unit.target: 生成对象指定属性的列。

trans-unit.source: The collection of columns for the properties of the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象的属性的列集合。

trans-unit.source: Each row in the data grid is bound to an object in the data source, and each column in the data grid is bound to a property of the data object.
trans-unit.target: 数据网格中的每一行绑定到数据源中的一个对象，并在数据网格中的每一列绑定到数据对象的属性。

trans-unit.source: This method generates a collection that contains a column for each property.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将生成包含每个属性的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: Calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GenerateColumns%2A> method provides the same functionality as setting the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 调用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GenerateColumns%2A>方法提供与设置相同的功能<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AutoGenerateColumns%2A>属性`true`。

trans-unit.source: You will typically not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: 通常将不从你的代码中调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: This method is provided to enable designer tools to generate a collection of columns that can be edited by the user and then placed into the data grid.
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于启用设计器工具来生成可以编辑用户，然后放入数据网格的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: A designer tool can use the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GenerateColumns%2A> method to return a collection of auto-generated columns.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用设计器工具<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GenerateColumns%2A>方法以返回自动生成的列的集合。

trans-unit.source: The designer tool can then provide a user interface to enable the user to edit the column types, and add or remove columns as necessary.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该设计器工具可以提供一个用户界面来使用户可以编辑的列类型，并添加或删除根据需要的列。

trans-unit.source: The column collection can then be used to populate the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> collection of the data grid by adding each column to the collection.
trans-unit.target: 然后可以使用列集合来填充<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A>数据网格，通过将每个列添加到集合的集合。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="itemProperties" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="itemProperties" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Instantiates a new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 实例化一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The row that is the container.
trans-unit.target: 作为容器的行。

trans-unit.source: The data item in the row for which <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility" /> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 返回了 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility" /> 的行的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility" /> property for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" /> that represents the specified data item.
trans-unit.target: 获取表示指定的数据项的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsVisibility" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: The visibility for the row that contains the <paramref name="item" />.
trans-unit.target: 包含 <paramref name="item" /> 的行的可见性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates which grid lines are shown.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示显示哪些网格线。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies which grid lines are shown in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中显示哪些网格线的枚举值之一。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.All" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.All" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the lines that separate rows and columns are visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定单独的行和列的行是否可见。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the lines when they are visible is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.VerticalGridLinesBrush%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalGridLinesBrush%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 通过指定时都是可见的行的外观<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.VerticalGridLinesBrush%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalGridLinesBrush%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GridLinesVisibility" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GridLinesVisibility" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> supports custom keyboard scrolling.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 是否支持自定义键盘滚动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This property is used to notify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> that keyboard input has been handled by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性用于通知<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollViewer>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>已通过键盘输入进行了处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the value that specifies the visibility of the row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于指定行和列标题可见性的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that indicates the visibility of row and column headers.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一，指示行或列标题的可见性。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility.All" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility.All" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: This property specifies whether the row and column headers are visible.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的行和列标题是否可见。

trans-unit.source: The appearance of the headers when they are visible is specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 指定的标头时都是可见的外观<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeaderStyle%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnHeaderStyle%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the converter that converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility" /> 转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> 的转换器。

trans-unit.source: The converter that converts a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility" /> to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于将 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility" /> 转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Visibility" /> 的转换器。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> template to control which parts of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> are visible for a particular <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>模板中用于控制的哪些部分<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>对于特定均为可见<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridHeadersVisibility>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HeadersVisibility" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HeadersVisibility" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush that is used to draw the horizontal grid lines.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于绘制水平网格线的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The brush that is used to draw the horizontal grid lines in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中的水平网格线的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is a black <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值为黑色 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.SolidColorBrush" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Horizontal grid lines separate the rows in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>.
trans-unit.target: 水平网格线的行分隔符<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>。

trans-unit.source: This property has no effect if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GridLinesVisibility%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.Vertical> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.None>.
trans-unit.target: 此属性如果不起作用<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.GridLinesVisibility%2A>属性设置为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.Vertical>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridGridLinesVisibility.None>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalGridLinesBrush" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalGridLinesBrush" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates how horizontal scroll bars are displayed in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个指示如何在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中显示水平滚动条的值。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies the visibility of horizontal scroll bars in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值之一，它指定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中的水平滚动条可见性。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Auto" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see cref="F:System.Windows.Controls.ScrollBarVisibility.Auto" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.HorizontalScrollBarVisibility" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new item is created.
trans-unit.target: 在创建新项时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event enables event handler to initialize the new item with custom default values.
trans-unit.target: 借助于此事件，事件处理程序来初始化具有自定义默认值的新项。

trans-unit.source: The item to test.
trans-unit.target: 要测试的项。

trans-unit.source: Determines if an item is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定项是否为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the item is a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果项为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the user can edit values in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示用户是否可在 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中的编辑值。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the rows and cells are read-only; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" />（如果行和单元格是只读的）；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A> property to `true` to make all the cells in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> read-only.
trans-unit.target: 设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly%2A>属性`true`进行中的所有单元格<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>只读的。

trans-unit.source: To make individual columns or cells read-only, set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties.
trans-unit.target: 若要使单个列或单元格，只读的设置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridCell.IsReadOnly%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If a conflict exists between the settings at the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>, column, or cell levels, a value of `true` takes precedence over a value of `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果在设置之间存在冲突<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>，列或单元格级别，值为`true`优先于值为`false`。

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true` while the control is in editing mode, all pending edits are discarded.
trans-unit.target: 如果此属性设置为`true`控件在处于编辑模式时，所有挂起的编辑将被丢弃。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.IsReadOnly" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Occurs after a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" /> is instantiated, so that you can customize it before it is used.
trans-unit.target: 当实例化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" /> 之后发生，以便您可以在使用它之前先进行自定义。

trans-unit.source: To improve performance, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true` by default.
trans-unit.target: 若要提高性能，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`默认情况下。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A> property is set to `true`, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> does not instantiate a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item in the bound data source.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.EnableRowVirtualization%2A>属性设置为`true`、<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>不会实例化<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>绑定的数据源中的每个数据项的对象。

trans-unit.source: Instead, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> objects only when they are needed, and reuses them as much as it can.
trans-unit.target: 相反，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>对象仅当它们需要并为它可以重用它们。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> creates a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> object for each data item that is currently in view and recycles the row when it scrolls out of view.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>创建<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>为每个数据项的当前视图中，当它滚动出视野时回收行的对象。

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to make any necessary changes to a row before it is used.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，可对行进行任何必要的更改，然后使用它。

trans-unit.source: To undo these customizations before a row is reused, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRow> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要撤消这些自定义，在行重复使用之前，处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRow>事件。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a new row details template is applied to a row.
trans-unit.target: 当新的行详细信息模板应用到行时发生。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs one time for each row to which a new row details template is applied.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生一次新的行详细信息模板应用到每个行。

trans-unit.source: A new details template is applied to a row in one of the following cases:
trans-unit.target: 新的详细信息模板应用于以下情况之一中的行：

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>属性值更改。

trans-unit.source: The row <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A> property value is `null` and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> property value changes.
trans-unit.target: 行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow.DetailsTemplate%2A>属性值是`null`和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>属性值更改。

trans-unit.source: This event enables you to make any necessary changes to the row details element before it is used.
trans-unit.target: 此事件，可对行详细信息元素进行任何必要的更改，然后使用它。

trans-unit.source: To undo these customizations before the row details element is reused, handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails> event.
trans-unit.target: 若要撤消这些自定义在重复使用行详细信息元素之前，处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails>事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the maximum width constraint of the columns and headers in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中列和标题的最大宽度约束。

trans-unit.source: The maximum width of the columns and headers in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />, in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)].

trans-unit.target: 当你设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth%2A>属性，它必须是大于或等于 0.0。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MaxColumnWidth" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: The maximum size that the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> can occupy.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 可占用的最大大小。

trans-unit.source: Determines the desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 确定 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 的所需大小。

trans-unit.source: The desired size of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.

trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中列和标题的最小宽度约束。

trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.target: 行的最小高度约束（以 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_dipixel#plural](~/includes/tlasharptla-dipixelsharpplural-md.md)] 为单位）。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 注册的默认值为 0.0。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: When you set a value for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A> property, it must be greater than or equal to 0.0.
trans-unit.target: 当你设置的值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A>属性，它必须是大于或等于 0.0。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType> are not valid values for this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Double.PositiveInfinity?displayProperty=nameWithType> 和<xref:System.Double.NaN?displayProperty=nameWithType>不是此属性的有效值。

trans-unit.source: The value restrictions on the <xref:System.Double> value are enforced by a <xref:System.Windows.ValidateValueCallback> mechanism.

trans-unit.target: 如果你尝试设置一个值，不是有效，则会引发一个运行时异常。

trans-unit.source: If a conflict exists between the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A> property and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeight%2A> property, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A> takes precedence.
trans-unit.target: 如果之间存在冲突<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A>属性和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowHeight%2A>属性，<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A>优先。

trans-unit.source: However, the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> property set on an individual <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow> has higher precedence than a property set at the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> level and is not constrained by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 但是，<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A>在单个上设置属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow>优先级高于在设置的属性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>级别并不受<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight%2A>属性。

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.MinRowHeight" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ColumnDisplayIndexChanged" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> requires that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> property of all columns must be unique integers from 0 to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A><xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> -1.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> 要求<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>所有列的属性必须为从 0 到的唯一整数<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.Columns%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ColumnDefinitionCollection.Count%2A> -1。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> of one column changes, the change will typically cause the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A> of other columns to change too.
trans-unit.target: 因此，当<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>一列更改时，更改通常会导致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.DisplayIndex%2A>的其他列来更改过。

trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: This method prepares the clipboard content for each selected row before the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CopyingRowClipboardContent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 此方法将剪贴板内容准备之前每个所选行<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.CopyingRowClipboardContent>引发事件。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ClipboardCopyMode%2A> property specifies whether the column header content is prepared in addition to the row content.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.ClipboardCopyMode%2A>属性指定除了行内容是否准备好列标题内容。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRow%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRow(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The data for the event.
trans-unit.target: 事件的数据。

trans-unit.source: Raises the <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails" /> event.
trans-unit.target: 引发 <see cref="E:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails" /> 事件。

trans-unit.source: Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate.
trans-unit.target: 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails%2A> method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails%2A> 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。

trans-unit.source: This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.
trans-unit.target: 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。

trans-unit.source: When overriding <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowDetailsEventArgs)" /> in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s <see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowDetailsEventArgs)" /> method so that registered delegates receive the event.
trans-unit.target: 在重写<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowDetailsEventArgs)" />在派生类中，一定要调用基类的<see cref="M:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.OnUnloadingRowDetails(System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRowDetailsEventArgs)" />方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

trans-unit.source: The new <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />.
trans-unit.target: 新的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridRow" />。

trans-unit.source: The data item that the row contains.
trans-unit.target: 行包含的数据项。

trans-unit.source: Prepares a new row for the specified item.
trans-unit.target: 为指定项准备新行。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a cell enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 在单元格进入编辑模式时发生。

trans-unit.source: You can handle this event to modify a cell when it enters edit mode.
trans-unit.target: 你可以处理此事件以进入编辑模式时更改的单元格。

trans-unit.source: This event occurs after the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit> event if that event is not canceled.
trans-unit.target: 此事件发生后<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.BeginningEdit>如果未取消该事件的事件。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the default brush for the row background.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置行背景的默认画笔。

trans-unit.source: The brush that paints the background of a row.
trans-unit.target: 用于绘制行背景的画笔。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowBackground" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the converter that converts a Boolean value to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectiveScrollingOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取用于将布尔值转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectiveScrollingOrientation" /> 的转换器。

trans-unit.source: The converter that converts a Boolean value to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectiveScrollingOrientation" />.
trans-unit.target: 用于将布尔值转换为 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.SelectiveScrollingOrientation" /> 的转换器。

trans-unit.source: This property can be used in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> template to control how the row details scroll based on the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AreRowDetailsFrozen%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性可在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>模板中用于控制如何行详细信息向下滚动基于<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.AreRowDetailsFrozen%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template that is used to display the row details.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于显示行详细信息的模板。

trans-unit.source: The template that is used to display the row details.
trans-unit.target: 用于显示行详细信息的模板。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。

trans-unit.source: You can customize the data presentation in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> by adding a row details section.
trans-unit.target: 你可以自定义中的数据演示文稿<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>通过添加行详细信息部分。

trans-unit.source: Adding a row details section enables you to group some data in a template that is optionally visible or collapsed.
trans-unit.target: 添加行详细信息部分，可根据需要可见还是折叠的模板中的某些数据进行分组。

trans-unit.source: You define the row details template as either inline XAML or as a resource.
trans-unit.target: 为任一内联 XAML 或作为资源定义行详细信息模板。

trans-unit.source: A data template that is added as a resource can be used throughout the project without re-creating the template.
trans-unit.target: 可以在整个项目能使用作为资源添加的数据模板，而无需重新创建模板。

trans-unit.source: A data template that is added as inline XAML is only accessible from the control where it is defined.
trans-unit.target: 添加，如内联 XAML，才可以访问从控件定义数据模板。

trans-unit.source: You can modify the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> before it is displayed by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRowDetails> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以修改<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>显示通过处理之前<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.LoadingRowDetails>事件。

trans-unit.source: You should handle the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails> event to undo changes that are made while loading the row details.
trans-unit.target: 应处理<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.UnloadingRowDetails>事件来撤消加载行详细信息时所做的更改。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> with a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A> defined inline.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>与<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate%2A>以内联方式定义。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid> displays three values in each row and three more values in the details section when the row is selected.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid>显示三个值中的每一行和第三个详细信息部分中的多个值选择的行时。

trans-unit.source: This example is part of a larger example available in the [How to: Add Row Details to a DataGrid Control](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control.md) topic.
trans-unit.target: 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[How to： 到 DataGrid 控件添加行详细信息](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/how-to-add-row-details-to-a-datagrid-control.md)主题。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid.RowDetailsTemplate" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the template selector that is used for the row details.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于行详细信息的模板选择器。

trans-unit.source: The template selector that is used for the row details.
trans-unit.target: 用于行详细信息的模板选择器。

trans-unit.source: The registered default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 已注册的默认值为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: For more information about what can influence the value, see <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />.
trans-unit.target: 有关可以影响值的因素的更多信息，请参见 <see cref="T:System.Windows.DependencyProperty" />。
